Name: Apple Strudel
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
RIM glass with cinnamon and sugar (moisten the outside edge with sugar syrup and dip into cinnamon powder).
Review: Apple, vanilla and a hint of Scotch and cinnamon- reminiscent of the dessert but a good deal drier.
Nutrition: One serving of Apple Strudel contains 210 calories
